1.0.0.name: drupal/featurelist

security-coverage.message: Covered by Drupal's security advisory policy

1.0.0.description: Featurelist provides a configurable table of feature states, for example your products or services features. You may check or negate a feature and set an optional text for each. It is built upon tablefield.
